statements: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE total_purchases > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_purchase_date FROM customers WHERE last_purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT customer_id, email, total_purchases FROM customers WHERE last_purchase_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE total_purchases > 1000 ORDER BY last_purchase_date DESC, total_purchases ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE last_purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE total_purchases BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY last_name, first_name;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com' OR email LIKE '%@yahoo.com';
SELECT customer_id, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE last_purchase_date >= '2022-06-01' ORDER BY last_purchase_date DESC, total_purchases DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT segment_name FROM SegmentedCustomers WHERE segment_id = 3;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_history FROM Customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_history FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, purchase_history FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers
SELECT customer_id, email, purchase_amount FROM customers WHERE purchase_amount > 1000
SELECT purchase_id, product_name FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount < 50
SELECT strategy_name, target_audience, campaign_start_date FROM marketing_strategies
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_amount FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE c.customer_id = 2;
SELECT strategy_name, target_audience FROM marketing_strategies WHERE campaign_end_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY strategy_id;
SELECT customer_name, email, purchase_amount FROM customers WHERE purchase_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_birthdate > '1990-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_amount FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_birthdate >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_date = '2022-10-01';
SELECT customer_name, discount_code, discount_amount FROM customers JOIN discounts ON customers.customer_id = discounts.customer_id WHERE discount_amount > 50 ORDER BY discount_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, purchase_amount FROM customers WHERE purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, email, total_amount FROM customers JOIN purchase_history ON customers.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id;

SELECT customer_name, email, segment_name FROM customers JOIN customer_segments ON customers.customer_id = customer_segments.customer_id JOIN segments ON customer_segments.segment_id = segments.segment_id;
SELECT strategy_id, segment_name, strategy_details FROM marketing_strategies JOIN segments ON marketing_strategies.segment_id = segments.segment_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE purchase_amount > 100;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customers ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT c.customer_name, p.purchase_date, p.total_amount FROM customers c JOIN purchase_history p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id;
SELECT c.customer_name, s.segment_name FROM customers c JOIN customer_segments cs ON c.customer_id = cs.customer_id JOIN segments s ON cs.segment_id = s.segment_id;
